Definition: Licensed by Health Canada - products that can be administered at POS – “on the shelves”
License issued by Health Canada - market authorization holder has not made the product available in Canada - not "on the shelves" in Canada

Made available through the SAP program – products that may be administered at POS  (on the shelf) or historical (not on shelf).
Products that have not been available for use in Canada; product name used for history  - not “on the shelves” in Canada
